kubejs.ponder.tag.ctnhponder.description: Ponders on Industrial/Magic Multiblocks in Part of CTNH.
Ponders on the stress multi block machine in CTNH.
kubejs.ponder.tag.kinetic_input.descript: Ponders on the kinetic hatch in CTPP.
kubejs.ponder.assembly_line_building.hea: How to build a gregtech multiblock
kubejs.ponder.assembly_line_building.tex: First, you need a assembly line main block.
Place the storage part of the AE subnet.
Please note that quartz fiber should be used to disconnect the direct connection between the subnet and the main network, while also supplying power to the subnet.
Set the priority of the storage bus, decreasing from the main block direction to the output bus, which means whether your materials will enter the assembly line in the correct order for synthesis.
Place the 'one click template' ('+'button) in the template encoding terminal of the pattern provide to ensure that the materials are output to the buffer in the correct order.
Change the lock synthesis mode to 'until the main product is returned' on the left side of the pattern provide.
Put in the research data required for the formula
Congratulations, you have learned how to use AE2 for assembly line automation.
One click placement using the terminal.
Place the pattern provider in the AE main network, paying attention to place to closely to the ULV output bus.
Use a wrench to adjust the sample supplier to send material upwards.
Place any level of buffer, pay attention to place to closely following the quadruple input hatch.
Set automatic output direction for items
kubejs.ponder.big_dam_1.text_1: First, you need a big dam main block
kubejs.ponder.big_dam_1.text_2: One click placement using the terminal.
kubejs.ponder.big_dam_1.text_3: Note that the water will not automatically place, remember to manually fill it in
kubejs.ponder.big_dam_1.text_4: The top layer of water will freeze, so you can place blocks above the water source to prevent freezing.
kubejs.ponder.big_dam_2.header: Limitations on the hatch of the big dam
kubejs.ponder.big_dam_2.text_1: Place the input hatch to ensure that lubricating oil can be input
kubejs.ponder.big_dam_2.text_2: You need at least 16 LV kinetic output hatch to fully output the stress inside the big dam, otherwise the dam will not work
kubejs.ponder.block_ponder.text_1: This is kinetic hatch,they have different levels.
kubejs.ponder.block_ponder.text_2: The lowest level of kinetic hatch you may use is the LV kinetic hatch,it have 32768su input/output at 256RPM speed.
kubejs.ponder.block_ponder.text_3: Similar to gregtech's boost mechanism,the required stress * 4 is required for each level of the kinetic hatch
kubejs.ponder.coke_oven_building.header: How to build a gregtech multiblock
kubejs.ponder.coke_oven_building.text_1: First, you need a multiblock main block.(Use a coke oven block as an example)
kubejs.ponder.coke_oven_building.text_2: Then the whole sturcture will be placed as you have enough blocks
kubejs.ponder.coke_oven_building.text_3: You can replace any block in the structure with a coke oven hatch
kubejs.ponder.coke_oven_building.text_4: So that you can export the fluid and item through it with pipes
kubejs.ponder.meadou_building.header: How to build a gregtech multiblock
kubejs.ponder.meadou_building.text_1: First, you need a meadow main block.
kubejs.ponder.meadou_building.text_10: The output of pigs is pork.
kubejs.ponder.meadou_building.text_11: The output of chickens is eggs.
kubejs.ponder.meadou_building.text_13: Finally, place the container and you can use the meadow perfectly.
kubejs.ponder.meadou_building.text_2: One click placement using the terminal.
kubejs.ponder.meadou_building.text_3: Lily pad and water can not automatically place, remember to manually fill them in.
kubejs.ponder.meadou_building.text_4: Ensure sufficient space for output items and liquids.
kubejs.ponder.meadou_building.text_5: Don't forget to set the circuit to 0.
kubejs.ponder.meadou_building.text_7: Put in animals, the more animals there are, the more they produce.
kubejs.ponder.meadou_building.text_8: The output of cows is milk and leather.
kubejs.ponder.meadou_building.text_9: The output of sheep is wool.
kubejs.ponder.neutron_activator_building: How to build a gregtech multiblock
First, you need a neutron activator main block.
One click placement using the terminal.
Place a machine control cover plate in the direction facing redstone at the neutron accelerator.

Set the maximum kinetic energy of the neutron sensor to the maximum kinetic energy required by the formula, and the minimum kinetic energy to the minimum kinetic energy required by the formula+5MeV (1MeV=1000Kev).
The kinetic energy of the neutron activator will now be maintained within the required kinetic energy range of the formula.
kubejs.ponder.ritual_diviner.text_1: First, you need a master ritual stone.
kubejs.ponder.rune_ritual.header: How to finish the rune ritual
kubejs.ponder.rune_ritual.text_1: First, place the central rune holder
kubejs.ponder.rune_ritual.text_2: Then place other rune holder at the position you see in the jei
kubejs.ponder.rune_ritual.text_3: Put the right item on the right position
kubejs.ponder.rune_ritual.text_4: Then drop the catalysm of the ritual in the area
kubejs.ponder.rune_ritual.text_5: Also, don't forget to prepare a wandering trader here for sacrifice
kubejs.ponder.rune_ritual.text_6: Finally, make sure you have enough mana in your mana ring and just right click the central rune holder
kubejs.ponder.rune_ritual.text_7: If you find that all items on the ground have been cleared, it means the ritual has started successfully.
How to build a gregtech multiblock
First, you need a smashing factory main block.
One click placement using the terminal.
Due to issues with the terminal, the terminal placed crushing wheel is not placed in the correct direction, but rather appears in this form
At this point, we need to manually replace the crushing wheel in the correct direction.
If there are multiple kinetic input hatch of different levels in the smashing factory, the actual operating speed will be calculated based on the highest level of kinetic input hatch.
Now you can use the smashing factory normally. Please note that this machine does not produce any grinding by-products
kubejs.ponder.windmill_control_center_bu: How to build a gregtech multiblock
First, you need a windmill control center main block
One click placement using the terminal.
Place the input hatch to ensure that lubricating oil can be input
Place sufficient kinetic output hatch to ensure that stress can be output.
Place windmill bearings within the 16 grid radius of the main block, and the more they are placed, the more stress they will output. A maximum of 16 windmill bearings can be included.
Connect 128 sails or wool to each windmill bearing to maximize the stress of each windmill bearing.
With sufficient stress output compartment, you can now enjoy the power of the windmill.
